page.title: 05LIFESTYLES:A DAY IN MY LIFE.
page.content: BY{IAN GILES I get up at about 8:00 in the morning. I get dressed and have breakfast at about 8:15.David calls for me at 8:40 and we leave for school,we get to school at about 8:50 and usually play He-on the lines until 9:00.Then we lead in and have assembly,then we go to French followed by Maths.At 10:30 it is break.I usually play with Ben,Mark,Darren and Hugh.We have English until lunch.I eat sandwiches. It is lunch break at 12:30 to 1:00.At 1:00 we do poetry on Wednesday,after last break we have games until 3:30 then I go home.I go out with my friends quite often,then I have dinner and go out to Youth Club with Ben and Hugh sometimes.I go home at 9:00 have a drink and watch T.V. for 15minutes. Then I get ready for bed and go to bed at around 9:45.
